name: Football Star Pro Runner Shoot 3D
description:
From the makers of Return Man:

THE FUNNEST SOCCER APP FOR FREE ON APPLE!

The crowd is cheering and YOU are the star player! Your objective is to run as far as you can, dodging obstacles and collecting balls to unlock new characters, and exciting power ups!

Run through the city, but watch out for objects in your way. You can go straight, turn left, turn right, whichever way you want to go on the road, but around each corner is an obstacle that you must avoid! Swipe up to jump, swipe down to slide under, and move left and right!

When a turn approaches be sure to swipe in the direction you want to turn!

Power ups such as speed boost, double ball collections and much more!

So are you ready to be the next soccer star? Download this game today and find out!

S.H.A.W.T.E.D
